/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their gray roofs and white walls standing out against the overcast sky. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the historic setting. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a natural contrast to the urban environment. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the greenery in the background. The image provides a glimpse into the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
